resources.string: A wise man once said that "One man's trash is another man treasure"
With this application, you will have a social network to give and to be received.
Just tap and add some description and give your unused item to someone whom really in need.
Just tap and seek for want you need that available from good people around you.
We just need your registered email to send your email reset instructions.
Don\'t have an account? just sign up
Already have an account? just log in
Sorry, we can not find any data for your input, please try other key
Sorry, we can not show you anything. Something\'s wrong and i don\'t know why :\\
This post has been removed from favorite
This post has been added to favorite
You already send the request before
Password must be at least 6 characters
Password and it\'s confirm does not match.
You already review this user before.
"You are now following this user, you will get notification when this user have new post."
You are now stop following this user.
Your password had been changed successfully.
Sorry, we can not complete this action.
Authentication failed, please check again your old password.

The owner of this post had granted you this post. This mean you are chosen by the owner to receive the items. Please contact the owner to get the items. Our mission here is complete.\nHave a nice day!
Are you sure you want to log out?
This action will totally remove your data from system. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
To confirm sending request to receive this item. Tap OK.
Are you sure you want to delete this?
You are the owner of this post!
Currently we don\'t have any online support system yet. If you get trouble logging in please contact email thanhahvan1@gmail.com for help
Which do you want to search?
Please turn on your GPS to complete the process
Please enter the description for your post
Please choose a category for your post
Please enter the title for your post

You just decide to give item in this post to user. We now will provide you information of this user. Click OK to go to their profile. Please contact them to discus where and when for you to give the item. We will notify them about this even. Have a nice day!
This post is closed by owner so you can not send request anymore"
This post is closed so you can not edit anymore"
Your request has been sent to owner. Now just wait for their response.
Your account had been deleted from Piker
"We have sent you instructions to reset your password!"
We complete updating data. Tab OK to back to previous screen.
When you change the status to closed, other users can not send receiving request to you post any more
Please turn on your internet connection
Bellow are behavior of this application that user need to aware:
When user create a new post, if user\'s location detector is turning on, then application will automatics track the current location of user's device.
The post\'s location is reveal to other users.
User email, name, phone number, address is reveal to other users.
User password is known by only user, system admin won\'t have any clue of user password in the situation of user forgot password.
User can\'t spam message to people.
Requester must respect the choice of Post owner.
User email is reveal to other users.
When you create a new post, make sure your device is turn on location service to make your post\'s location visible to others to help our service connect to seeker near you.
Make sure the title is simple and the images you add to post is clear.
Your description is fine anyway. Other people can ask you more through message.
Choose to follow people will make it notify you when they have new post.
Your old item maybe seem useless to you but have a great power to other.
Please don\'t feel hesitate send request to the post, we people are here to share.
PikerFree is final year thesis of:
Pham Thi Dung - Node JS developer
